patterns: I'd like to know about you something?
What kind of institution you are?
responses: I belong to one of the best IT and Management colleges of Nepal, Texas International college and Texas College of Management and IT.Texas college of Management & IT is the best Management, Hotel Management and IT college providing the International education. We believe in imparting the the practical education through the modern educational pedagogy. Along with academic excellence students can enhance themselves in professional careers. Texas is the top College providing the best and practical education. We have always tried to minimise the gap between academy and industry.

patterns: When can i come to you?
responses: Our administration opens 5AM-7PM everyday.We also provide the services through web, so we are available 24/7

patterns: May I know your website address?
Have you got a phone number?
responses: You can visit our website at texasintl.edu.np or texascollege.edu.np or contact us at 01-4588627

patterns: What types of courses do you run?
responses: Some of our universities courses include BIT, BBA, BBM, BCA, BCS( CYBER SECURITY), BScCSIT, BBS, BA, BSW, etc. and we also have montessori,schooling, +2 and master courses.
